hero.description: Algorithmic trading, boosted by Machine Learning—integrated with your crypto exchange.

data.label: Data
data.title: Fetch data
data.description: We are fetching financial data from the crypto exchanges. All indicators and algorithms are calculated inside the app.

algorithm.label: Algorithm
algorithm.title: Custom algorithms
algorithm.description: We transformed +10 years of trading experience into algorithms.

backtest.label: Backtest
backtest.title: Backtest algorithm
backtest.description: Backtest Algorithms to see performance of every algorithm. And pick the best one.

decision.label: Decision
decision.title: Do we trade?
decision.description: Our machine learning model helps improve algorithm performance. And make decisions to trade or not.

cryptoExchange.label: Crypto Exchange
cryptoExchange.title: Crypto Exchange

trainClassifier.label: Train classifier
trainClassifier.title: Train classifier
trainClassifier.description: We train our machine learning model to make better decisions.

mlModel.label: ML Model
mlModel.title: Trained model
mlModel.description: The trained model is used to spot weak signals generated by the algorithms.

tradingJournal.label: Trading Journal
tradingJournal.title: Trading Journal
tradingJournal.description: We keep track of all our trades in a trading journal.

backtestModel.label: Backtest
backtestModel.title: Backtest trained model
backtestModel.description: Backtest the trained model to see how it performs with different parameters.

indicators.label: Indicators
indicators.title: Indicators
indicators.description: We use indicators to train models and identify weak spots in algorithms.

financialData.label: Financial Data
financialData.title: Financial Data
financialData.description: We use financial data to train models and identify weak spots in algorithms.

sphere.title: Bring ML to your trading
sphere.description: Our Machine Learning models are trained on thousands of trades to boost algorithm performance.

step1.title: Log in or create an account to get started
step1.description: Create a secure account to unlock every tool. We protect your information with industry-standard encryption and strict access controls, so your data stays private while you work.
step1.containerTitle: Log in or create an account

step2.title: Pick algorithm and cryptocurrency to trade
step2.description: Pick an algorithm, then a cryptocurrency, and backtest the pair. You can explore different combinations and compare results.

step3.title: Connect to your crypto exchange
step3.description: Connect your exchange to enable automated execution. We support several popular exchanges and are adding more. You can also run signals without connecting an exchange.

step4.title: Enable automated trading
step4.description: Set your parameters and choose whether to execute trades automatically or receive notifications. The system runs continuously and follows your configuration.
step4.containerTitle: You all set! Now bot will trade for you

footer.title: Get 1 month
footer.description: Get access to our trading algorithms, backtest and machine learning models for 1 month for free. No credit card required.
footer.tagline: Trading platform for automated crypto trading

review1.quote: I have a lot more free time.
review1.description: Monkeys Finance reduced the time I spend watching charts. I can focus on other things while it monitors signals based on my settings.
review1.name: Pawel Kowalski

review2.quote: I'm so glad I found Monkeys Finance. Signals are clear, and the automation is easy to configure.
review2.name: Omar El-Sayed

review3.description: From generating signals to tracking strategy performance over time and optionally automating execution, everything is in one place.
review3.name: Alexey Kuznetsov

review4.quote: The ML filter is a helpful extra layer.
review4.description: Adding a machine-learning step to screen signals has been useful, especially for reducing noise.
review4.name: Steve Smith

about.title: About Monkeys Finance
about.subtitle: Building automated crypto
about.intro: We built Monkeys Finance for crypto traders who want automation without watching charts around the clock. Our cloud-based system runs 24/7, continuously analyzing cryptocurrency markets to identify trading opportunities.
about.howItWorksDescription: Based on your selected algorithm, our system runs continuously in the cloud, monitoring for trading signals. When a signal is detected, it's passed to machine learning models trained on years of historical market data for verification. If the signal passes our rigorous validation checks, the system automatically executes trades on your exchange or sends you a notification through your preferred channel.
about.differenceDescription: Monkeys Finance goes beyond basic algorithmic trading by incorporating machine learning models trained on years of market behavior. Every signal generated by our algorithms is validated through our ML models to ensure quality and reliability. We run comprehensive monthly backtests to verify strategy performance and provide you with detailed reports. Additionally, we continuously retrain our models on the latest market data to adapt to evolving market conditions.
about.whatsNextDescription: We're actively expanding support for additional exchanges, notification providers, strategies, and features. We value your input—if you have ideas or feedback, reach out to us on GitHub or Telegram. Help us build the best trading platform together.

backtestTable.description: Machine learning can improve algorithm performance. We train our model on thousands of trades to inform decisions.
backtestTable.chartDescription: Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

staticDitherBackground.description: Side-by-side results for Bitcoin, the strategy without leverage, and the strategy with 5× leverage.
staticDitherBackground.stat1: return on investment in Bitcoin (spot market)
staticDitherBackground.stat2: return on investment with our algorithm and 5x leverage
staticDitherBackground.stat3: return on investment with our algorithm and no leverage
staticDitherBackground.disclaimer: * based on a backtest performed on the period of jan 1 2025 - dec 1 2025 on Binance.us. Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

chartCompareToBitcoin.titleSecondLine: in Bitcoin at the beginning of 2025?
chartCompareToBitcoin.description: In a down 2025 market (Bitcoin -12%), our ML strategy delivered stronger simulated results versus buy-and-hold.
chartCompareToBitcoin.chartDescription: Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

philosophy.quote: In the short run, the market is a voting machine; in the long run, it is a weighing machine.
philosophy.author: Benjamin Graham
philosophy.description: This famous quote reflects the philosophy behind this platform. Graham's legacy is foundational for many investors, and we're no exception. This platform is built to navigate short-term market noise and to pursue a statistical edge over the long run.

history.emptyDescription: After bot completes a trade, it will appear here.

header.title: Your
header.description: We use industry standards to protect you and your data. Our main priority is to ensure a safe trading experience.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Your data is processed on AWS infrastructure. Nothing is stored or processed in your browser, eliminating client-side vulnerabilities

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Multi-factor authentication powered by Clerk. Your credentials are managed by security experts, not stored in our database.

database.title: Database
database.description: Your account data is protected by the same database infrastructure used by Fortune 500 companies. Automatic backups ensure you'll never lose data

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: We encrypt your API keys with military-grade encryption before storing them—adding an extra security layer on top of database encryption.

credentialCard.securityNoteLine1: For security, your API credentials are encrypted and hidden.
credentialCard.securityNoteLine2: You can only update or delete them.
credentialCard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete these credentials?
credentialCard.deleteWarning: ⚠️ This will also delete {count} active instance{s}

algorithms.remainingDescription: Remaining - predicted remaining time in consolidation

footer.line1: If price crosses the flip price, the signal will be generated.
footer.line2: Flip price might change based on current market conditions.
